Name: Z: Escape
About the game: Z: Escape is a dark themed runner-shooter platformer game. Z-87 awakens with no memory of who he was, or what he is. Destroying the bio pod in which he was trapped, Z notices the laboratory equipment all around the room. Something horrific has been done to him in this laboratory space station. As the stations alarm goes off, he has no choice but to escape it. Mission: - Escape from the space station using your arm cannon. - Reach the space station docking bay. Description: The player is playing as Z-87, a laboratory experiment.
